titleStmt.title: A sermon of repentance. Preached by George Meriton Doctor of Diuinity, and one of his Maiesties chaplaines in ordinary
titleStmt.author: Meriton, George, d. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By George Eld] for Thomas Clarke, and are to be sold at the signe of the Angell in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Angell in Paules Church-yard
